items.sentence: If I\'d only known there was a possibility that that would happen, I\'d have been more careful.
It looks like the question was too easy for you. Next time, I\'ll have to make it a bit harder.
For some reason, people have been avoiding me like the plague ever since I got back from India.
Mary waited years for Tom to get out of prison and was very happy when he finally got released.
Tom could hear a commotion in front of his house, so he went outside to see what was happening.
